# Glossary {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| label: tbl-glossary
#| tbl-cap: Glossary of terms.
#| results: markup
#| echo: false

glossary_load_all("glossary/glossary.yml")

glossary::glossary_table(as_kable=F) |> 
  dplyr::filter(
    !duplicated(tolower(term))) |> 
  knitr::kable("pipe", escape = F, row.names = F)
```
